core/audits/dobetterweb/paste-preventing.message: Preventing input pasting is a UX anti-pattern, and undermines good security policy. [Learn more about user-friendly input fields](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lighthouse/best-practices/paste-preventing-inputs/).
Prevents users from pasting into input fields
Allows users to paste into input fields
